website_summaries.verdict: No need to give up the workout while on vacation – these lightweight swimming gloves create weight without having to lug along water dumbbells.
pros: Flexible yet provide enough resistance during exercise without causing shoulder strain
Preferable to swimming with a paddle board
Especially good for public pools, as they won't hinder movements
Users who do aquacise say that their joint pain is also reduced vs. using no gloves
cons: Color will fade quickly after swimming in chlorine pools unless rinsed out right after use
Seem to run a bit small

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had them one month, and already the Velcro is coming off on one of the them, and the stictching between the fingers is coming undone. Absolutely not worth the price, no matter how cheap. Edit/Update: I was contacted by the makers after posting this review, and they offered me a refund, following which they have repeatedly asked me to delete my negative review. Sorry, but offering a refund does not improve the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves--especially for aquatic exercise!!
customer_reviews.text: These water resistance swim gloves are amazing! I use them daily for teaching aquatic exercise. They really increase resistance and feel great on the hands. Some of my students say they help ease joint pain when they have arthritis but I don't so I can't say for sure.I bought the gloves in large not knowing what to expect and they fit well but my hands are average size. Almost every woman in my class can wear this particular pair comfortably. I recommend these gloves for swimmers naturally, but for any aquatic exercise format!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Sorbella

customer_reviews.title: Swim glove runs small
customer_reviews.text: Received this swim glove. Put it on and was very very tight. I wear a medium glove and ordered a medium swim glove. I thought maybe it will get better after I use it in the pool. Unfortunately nothing changed and it remained very very tight. I did not expect it to be loose but when you have trouble even getting it on, you know it is not the right size. I had to return it. It is well made with good stitching. I did find that it really did not give me any more resistance than when I spread my fingers in the water and used them for drag. I probably will not order another swim glove.
customer_reviews.author: Polite and Kind

customer_reviews.title: Large seems small. Didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the vendor contacted me notifying me of a refund. I don't remember requesting a refund. They read my review and offered it. They requested me to update my review. Kudos to their customer service. Original post: I got the large since I am a semi average male at 5'9" They were very very difficult to get on my one hand. I didn't try the other one. It felt so tight that I decided not to wear them in the pool or ever. Maybe it is a quality control issue, but they felt like they might be for much smaller people.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fun Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good for pool running
customer_reviews.text: These work well for added resistance for pool running. Easy to put on and seem like they will hold up well to chlorine and repeated use
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Improves your workout!!
customer_reviews.text: These mitts really increase your water aerobic workout. After wearing them a lot, if I do a class without them it feels like Im hardly working out. They are a little tough to get off when they are wet, but initially when they are dry, they are easy to put on. They are very durable but the chlorine in the pool has definitely faded the color. Some people in my class have other forms of these mitts. Ive seen more of a fabric material which gives resistance. I guess depending what you are looking for. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Received new pair from company.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these gloves for 2 months and the Velcro is already not sticking together. The first time I wore them the blue turned to a purple color and now after approximately 10 uses they look dirty gray. I wear them to Water Aerobics and yesterday the Velcro refused to stick, always before I could keep re-attaching but yesterday it just would not stick. Very dissatisfied with this product. New review: This company contacted me concerning my dissatisfaction with my gloves. They have sent me a new pair and they are doing ok for now. Will continue to keep you informed.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Perkins

customer_reviews.title: VERY INFERIOR PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 pair of this glove. The stitching on this glove unraveled the second time I put them on. The previous pair had to be stitched up constantly around the fingers where here stitching came out. SIZING: the medium size is uncomfortably tight for my VERY SMALL HANDS; cuts off circulation.. I would NEVER buy this product again!!!!!!!! CHEAP PRICE; CHEAP PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: Good product - I can't see how paying a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: They WORK just as advertised! I swim several times a week in a swim-spa, against a tether, and the arm exercise is the deal. The gloves dramatically increase the resistance with each stroke, for more exercise per session. One observation - to get the maximum effect, you have to stroke with your fingers spread wide apart, with the glove covering the space in between, thereby increasing the effective size and drag of your hand. If you keep your fingers closed, as in normal swimming, there is little effect from the gloves. Good product - I can't see how paying a lot more for a Name Brand would get better results.
customer_reviews.author: Bob of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand up to wear
customer_reviews.text: Update: I want to add that the seller contacted me and refunded my money after I complained about the gloves starting to come apart. Good customer service is important to me and I feel this seller has it. I purchased these just last August. I take a water aerobics class 2x a week and use these gloves most (but not all) of the time. I’m saddened to see they are beginning to fall apart already. The stitching between the fingers is pulling out. Luckily, I sew, have a machine and can repairing them but I don’t feel I should have to, they should have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne613

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used four pair of these swim gloves and each time the stitching on the fingers does not last.
customer_reviews.author: RobJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice resistance in the pool and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they give you nice resistance in the water. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Probably should have paid attention to bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: They originally fit ok, and arewere relatively comfortable and I thought they would be good BUT... 1) after ONE swim the stitching has come out of the piece by the velcro (and I don't think it is re-stitchable) so basically now they can't be closed around my wrist. 2) while they fit good the first swim they seem to have really stretch after just one short use in the pool (about 4 sets of 50 yards) so when I put them on now they are way to big. I didn't save the packaging so guess I can't return and am out the $9.99.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ITEM DEFECTIVE AWAITING TO HEAR FROM AMAZON TO EXCHANGE,INNO GEAR RESPONDED IMMEDIATELY AND EXCHANGED THE ITEM NO ???? ASKED. THEY WERE VERY NICE AND VERY QUICK TO RESPOND. REPLACEMENT ITEM HAS BEEN GREAT SO FAR. THANK YOU INNOGEAR. please noted addendum product is size large like original but does not fit , is WAY too big, measured against original pair and is over 1/2" bigger. could someone from Innogear please contact me concerning this problem. where do I return gloves???
customer_reviews.author: Donnamarie Watson

customer_reviews.title: An ok or great product if you don't  need to use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves went through the test with me. In a salt water pool every day. Price was good for the value. But just didn't last that long and had to repair several times to make them last at least 3 months. The velcro war off from the water. A ok product if you dont need on a daily basis. Found some on H2O water suits sight, those are now just over a yr. Old, however they are expensive and shipping is pricey too, but they are lasting for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: My needs are not for extra resistance but for ...
customer_reviews.text: My need has to do with Renaud's Syndrome. As I age, it simply becomes worse. I love the workout Water Aerobics as it has helped me get so much stronger in my abs and glutes. The gloves were ordered one size up (Medium) to keep my hands completely covered and warm. I also wear Land's End swimwear which includes skirted pants and a long sleeve cover up top. No more skipping class as it may be on the cold side. Bring the Water Aerobics on!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Okay I recently did a review about my stitching coming apart and they sent me a new pair but after receiving the new pair the stitching came apart not once but twice so I took them to a shoe repair here and he stitched them up for free but then another one came apart so I took them back to have him double stitch all of them He's going to triple stitch him for me but now it's costing me an extra $15 so I think it would be great if these companies that make these fins would say on them that there's a double stitching at least because they don't last with just that single stitch!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Good product first couple of swims, then thread between webbing began falling apart. After four swims they were like duct-taping two kitchen sponges to your hands. Pooxr quality control
customer_reviews.author: Bahoover

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these! Wasn't sure what to look for with material or sizing or pricing but I took a chance and ended up with exactly what I wanted for a good price. These are great for adding resistance to my water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: M. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Aquaman Gloves Improve Speed
customer_reviews.text: I went from the larger rigid Tyr hand paddles to these ‘Aquaman’ gloves. They have increased my speed. And I can swim any stroke with them, unlike the Tyr paddles. The Velcro, female side, wears out. I will replace the female side Velcro. Gloves are in good shape 2 yrs., average 3x/week use. Will buy again when they wear out. I love the swim aids.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Helps with water resistance during pool aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to use in my pool for aerobics. They are great. If you have a medium hand they are real snug and are a little hard to take off. That is not a problem for me because I light not having to worry about them being loose. They are good for added resistance. My daughter-in-law also uses them for swimming for a better work out. I’m glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Kid-sized wrist
customer_reviews.text: I used t own Speedo small gloves and they were much bigger than these mediums. The biggest problem is the wrist which, regardless of size, is barely over 6" wide. The tab to close the wrist is much shorter, so if you need a little extra space, they will not stay closed like mitts with longer tabs. I gave them to my 8-year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous genius

customer_reviews.title: As far as using the glove it does give a lot of extra resistance in the water and gives your arms a good work out
customer_reviews.text: I wear a M/L in leather gloves so ordered the med and the large of this glove. The medium was not even close to fitting, could not get them on. The large fits but it is very small around the wrist (and I do not have large wrists). I have to pull the Velcro tab a lot to get it to stay put. My fingers do not extend beyond the edge of the fingers on the glove so entire hand is encompassed. As far as using the glove it does give a lot of extra resistance in the water and gives your arms a good work out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a superhero when I wear these
customer_reviews.text: We do laps and tread water for a while to get some exercise when in the pool. These really work in terms of resistance and effort. Add this to the pool routine and you'll be sore in the morning; and that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jam D

customer_reviews.title: large may be LARGE for some but just too small
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description for large, these were just too small and next to impossible to get on easily or comfortably, thus velcro closure does not offer enough length to close around wrist (mans hand at 4.5inches across base of palm. Some mention that these stretch over time, but thats hard to factor into trying to initially use them. Will need to find a better option and will return.
customer_reviews.author: research diva

customer_reviews.title: They were uncomfortable.  However, I have arthritic hands so that's probably why.
customer_reviews.text: I use my hands for water exercises and they were aching from constant sculling and moving in the water. I thought these aquatic gloves would move more water and keep my hands from hurting. Actually, they were uncomfortable and I am back to using my hands. I think the act of having my fingers spread was the culprit.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Swimmers need these
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these three times. They add a resistance to my stroke which actually firms my upper arms over time. I have been using this product for about three years. The pair lasts about a year before the chlorine ruins them. I highly recommend. One other plus: they keep my wedding rings in place. The water resistance has increased my arm strength without even trying.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Product did not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was very good at first, however after only 6 months of using it for water aerobics all of the threads have come loose so that the glove just flops around. I purchased this pair after reading positive reviews and am VERY disappointed in them. Others in my class have had their gloves from other sellers for a lot longer and they are still as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small hands - medium gloves
customer_reviews.text: Wear small glove size, but got the Medium. Glad I did, the elastic wrists barely wrap and Velcros. All my fingers stick out except my pinkie and thumb, but that's fine. I hope that means it's nice and tight for when in the water and it loosens up a bit. Update 3 months later: I was right that the gloves stay nice and tight on my hands when in the water doing aerobics. So in 3 months of 3x a week 1hr in the chlorine water they are completely light-grey in color except the stitching is still black. Started out completely black/dark grey. Don't really care, though. They still do the job great and show no wear otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not for large people
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. I ordered L. I should have read the reviews. I could not use them. Way too small, I wear a size 11 ring. I have an 8" wrist. I could get them on but, they were just too tight for my arthritic hands. The quality seems good. Ill probably donate them to someone at my gym.
customer_reviews.author: shar sing

customer_reviews.title: These makea BIG difference to ability to move in water
customer_reviews.text: I am mainly using them as an exercise tool and to teach myself how to swim more effectively. I can really feel a difference in my shoulder and upper back muscles when I use these, and I seem to propel myself further with each stroke. Only issue is sizing. I have medium size hands (7 to 7.5 size surgical gloves) yet the medium size can be a struggle for me to get on, especially if they are wet. Maybe that's what supposed to happen, but I will get large if ordered again. Can't address durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: cnmbfa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I never thought customer service would be so great for an inexpensive item. These gloves certainly help with resistance in the water but in only one week the stitching between the fingers unraveled. I shared my experiences in a review and InnoGear immediately reached out and offered a replacement pair. I've been using the replacement pair for the last month and they're working perfectly and they haven't unraveled. The gloves are fine for my needs and the customer service of InnoGear is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: John Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Received these gloves and found one of the seams to already be coming apart, besides the fact that these won't fit an adult. Read several of the previous reviews, they will say the same thing. This company has no quality control and they are trying to skimp on material by making them too small. Would not purchase again, nor would I recommend them.....junk.
customer_reviews.author: Grego Mayorkian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love using them for swimming! Great product. Only thing I would suggest is order a size up! I have pretty small hands and ordered a medium. They are quite snug on me. They are even snug on my 11 yo. Daughter. Thats the only reason I wouldn't give 5 stars. Other than that they work great. I use them almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: JBaker

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: The medium size is a little snug getting on and off, but I guess that is better than loose. Once they are on, they are comfortable. I am a woman with squarish hands. They dry easily. I put them on a wire shelf to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Ok, after you do some home repairs. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: ETA: InnoGear reached out and offered a refund, which I think is excellent customer service. Finger stitching popped out after a week and I had to mend myself. Velcro wore out after a few months so I tuck the wrists into the hands. I like the gloves, but maybe paying a little more would result in more durability. Now I need a new pair because my stitching is ripping out the fabric. I swim 1.5 miles alternate days.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these gloves, pair for me and pair for my husband. Used mine about 4 times for water aerobic and they extremely faded unevenly at that .Also the right gloves velcro keeps coming open! I contacted Seller with problem ,but to No Avail!! That's why I am writing this honest Review,to let consumers know that this product is not worth purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Aqua fitness at its best!
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a second skin yet I could really feel the resistance in the water. Great water gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud  Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Too late return them!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my Aquatic swim glove! Until after a 2 month they turn to very light blue color and the stitches came apart:(. It over 30 days to return them , so I try to stitch them up that working for the time being but I am think maybe just order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: francine

customer_reviews.title: FALLING APART AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Update,amazon came thru and refunded my money. I did use the credit n bought another brand,working fine. Bought these Jun 2018. They are falling apart!! Very disappointed in the quality. They are coming apart at numerous seams near several fingers and near the base where you Velcro them on. Very snappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Spice

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these gloves-covered most all of fingers- which is good; ordered a large, definitely runs small, could hardly get my hand in. But, the most concerning was when I did get my hand in within two minutes my hand started to feel hot, and a burning sensation... couldn’t take the glove off quick enough, burning sensation lasted for more than ten minutes after. Smell is strong - will be returning... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I had the first pair for 4 years. I use them every day in the pool when I swim and workout. If I leave them out on the table in the sun, the color will fade.
customer_reviews.author: JudyH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not much resistance
customer_reviews.text: These gloves provide just a bit more resistance than bare hands. Nowhere near the resistance of paddles. Taking them on and off is a bit of a chore, but they are very comfortable while swimming. Can't speak to durability.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Use four times/week to swim freestyle and in water arobics ...
customer_reviews.text: Use four times/week to swim freestyle and in water arobics class. In arobics class it increases difficulty moving water by 20%. Would suggest you work up to using gloves. Gloves are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: storm'in norman

customer_reviews.title: Very handy. Do the job. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for increasing the work in my water work-out. I wanted to work out my arms more and am not really into lifting weights but pushing water around with these on has already made a noticeable difference in my arm muscles. I think that they may run small. My lady hands are not that big and I ordered large and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at the wrist!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger size because I like my gloves to extend over my finger tips to add resistance. Still, the wrists were tight. I have never had this problem with a water glove. Also, they started to fall apart after one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: kp21

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and true to size, fit well
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are true to size and fit well. They are easy to put on and stay in place during water aerobic exercises. They seem to be good quality as well. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Barth

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Would of enjoyed an extra Large better
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Would of enjoyed an extra Large better, but glove did not come in that size. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Shilling

customer_reviews.title: Seams split open after 4 uses. - Update, received refund
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using these gloves in my exercise routine, started good but the seam at the thumb has come apart and I’ve only had them for a week. Wish I could say the are great but falling apart after 4 times is not great. Thank you for the refund, greatly appreciate your prompt reply,
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to past quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had 2 sets of these before & they were fine. Fit performance & durability were all very good. The new ones, however, are much tighter even though the same size was ordered. The stitching is unraveling after just a few weeks weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Berks

customer_reviews.title: Great water gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality...really helps amp up the muscle development and aerobic level of water exercises. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: 🏊 Is A MUST! How About You?
customer_reviews.text: What a awesome idea the training aqua web glove it has been a plus for me personally after not being able to swim due to old military complications but still trying to find ways to assist me in getting back into the pool. Thank You. J Duncan
customer_reviews.author: J DUNCAN

customer_reviews.title: I used them and they were Great. I stayed in the pool an extra hour
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Gloves yesterday and I live in a condo. in Deerfield Beach Fl. I was in the pool when the mail lady showed up and she opened the box for me and she gave me them. I used them and they were Great. I stayed in the pool an extra hour. I Love them. Thank you, Rocky.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Leonardis

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair. First pair lasted 5+ years before velcro stopped working. This pair is starting to unravel on the seam. Will try to fix with needle and thread. Without even asking they sent a new pair. They are the best water gloves and this is the best place to get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buying Beau

customer_reviews.title: Best resistance and well made
customer_reviews.text: These create such a intense workout that I don't have to always worry about going to the above ground gym for weights. I love these
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and gentle resistance
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and add gentle resistance with water aerobics I have the barbell type of resistance tool but it’s too much for my shoulders. The gloves add just the right amount until I can work up to the barbells again
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Too big on my fingers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my aerobic exercise in the pool but one hands Velcro wasn’t staying closed. So this product did not work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mimyam

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The stitching has already come loose in a couple areas & required repair/re-stitching. However, I do use them frequently. So, I expected wear.
customer_reviews.author: ECS Guy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I use these for water aerobics. I have trouble holding the weights others use and these gloves give me good resistance
customer_reviews.author: M Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run very small
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run very small. I had to cut the little finger to allow my hand to fit. Update: I was refunded the price of the gloves. In fairness, they are of good quality, but be aware that they were smaller than what I would think the largest size availabe should be.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: I like swimming...
customer_reviews.text: To maximize my strokes I use this glove; one person said to me, you sure are fast, I replied, its these gloves and fins!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves a couple of weeks ago and they arrived within a couple of days! I am a water fitness instructor and I use them daily and they are working out just as I hoped they would! Provides great resistance and the fabric is holding up great since they are in water daily several times a day! I ordered a size medium and I have small to medium sized hands!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. These are a lot less expensive then similar premium brands so we were a bit leary when we purchased them, but they have been great. My wife absolutely loves them and she uses them 3-4 times a week. They are definitely a great value, like I said most others ar 2-3 times more expensive and these do just as good of job!
customer_reviews.author: MediaGuyKC

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves a couple of weeks ago. My arms are feeling the workout for sure. When I take them off and swim a few laps without them I feel more powerful in the water and I feel faster. Glad I bought them. I also like the fact that I can still move my swim lap counter with the fingerless glove.
customer_reviews.author: GAB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for upper body workout without the over bearing clumsiness ...
customer_reviews.text: You would not think these webbed "hands" would provide the resistance they do in the water. Excellent for upper body workout without the over bearing clumsiness of water barbells.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawk5355

customer_reviews.title: Size runs large
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these swim gloves I have purchased. They serve the purpose intended although they seem to run big. When they say pack of 2 they really mean 1 pair per pack.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Caron

customer_reviews.title: I thought I ordered Large...
customer_reviews.text: I received medium sized gloves. They were tight dry so I guessed they would be difficult to get off and on when wet. I sent them back. Again, I thought I asked for Large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I do water aerobics and I like how it keeps my hands at the web possession for better workout intensity. The small little complaint I would have is really nothing they need to make the wrist a little bit bigger even though they already have Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: They work just fine, but seem to come in a size smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: They work just fine, but seem to come in a size smaller than expected, so I have a hard time putting them on and off. Innogear saw my review and offered a full refund, no questions asked. So they are a good company, their gloves are just sized fairly small/
customer_reviews.author: Cougsfan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit perfectly, they are comfortable and wash-and-wear and I use them every time I swim.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good - but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I used these for the first time today. They worked well, but even though I ordered the large - they run very small. I could just barely secure the velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for swimming! Creates more resistance. This size is good for larger hands or mens hands
customer_reviews.author: Shawna R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The stitching between the fingers on both gloves came undone. Too late to return for a refund UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Pat White

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these for her aquatic aerobics. She ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these for her aquatic aerobics. She has a problem with a previously dislocated thumb and these provide resistance under water and are much easier on her thumb than using weights.
customer_reviews.author: Lalo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Update: After reading my review, customer service contacted me. Very good customer service. I added more stars based on that alone. Not worth it. Good idea but they don’t offer much more resistance than your hands without the gloves
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for aquatic exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great for aquatic exercise with carpel tunnel and arthritis in the wrist. I needed to add some extra velcro to reach around my very arthritic wrist, but worth it for the extra support while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: International Lady

customer_reviews.title: Best workout
customer_reviews.text: I love the gloves I am getting an Awesome work out with the gloves I would never have believed that A pair of web gloves could make a difference but they do you get a really good workout And no I’m not getting paid for this review LOL I just love the gloves
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Douthitt

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are pure junk. After using them about 7 times they started falling apart. Velcro didn’t hold and the stitching started coming apart and love throwing them away
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: Use them in a pool for resistance They seem to work fine and I do you like them They are not that hard to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water resistance
customer_reviews.text: These gloves provide good resistance for water exercises. They are comfortable to wear and easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved them at first but they unraveled after only a few times of use. I was seeing them for repairs every time I used them. I would not get again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Muriel Adams

customer_reviews.title: The right glove seam came apart from the wrist to the tip of the thumb making it unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves, other than the seam that came apart, are nice. I bought them in May but didn't use them until today, when they failed. Unfortunately I was outsied the return window. I'll have to remember that for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Designing Woman

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Had them 2 weeks and already coming apart between the fingers. Need better stitching. i really liked the way they fit and feel, but for them to fall apart so quickly is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J.

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Wearing these 3x week for water walking to gain leg strength. Very pleased with this product. No wear or tear on them. Best to put on dry before entering pool. Removing is not as easy, but certainly doable.. Hang in sun to dry with suit and water shoes. Much more resistance than bare hands. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 2720aved

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Way Off - Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I ordered the large size, which must be sized for munchkins (or else quality control is so weak that sizing is random). I gave them to my wife, who has very small hands, usually requiring a child's size in gloves, and for her they a bit loose but closer.
customer_reviews.author: RayCam

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely sturdy. I've used them 3-4 times a week for over a year and they are still fully usable. Only complaint is the Velcro tab is short. If a user had thick wrists they would be uncomfortable using the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger hands
customer_reviews.text: These aren't sized so if you have large hands they are very difficult to get on and off. Otherwise they seem to work fine--I've never had any before so it's hard to compare. The qualify of construction seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great resistance.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my water workouts. Just enough resistance. A little hard to grip and water dumbbells I might use, but otherwise, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Megan jerez

customer_reviews.title: Sizing too large
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands and these medium were way too big. Noticed stiching fraying when opened velcro. Would possibly try if smaller size available. Not my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: My first pair lasted several years without any problems. However this new pair started to fall apart about 4 weeks after getting them. I use them only twice a week, so after only 8 times wearing them the sewing between the fingers began to unravel. I tried to see them by hand but not much luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good ,inexpensive water exercise gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice,easy to put on and off water exercise gloves,inexpensive.I have them only about one month,for my twice a week deep water running class,so it's too early to talk about durability,so far except of loosing a little bit of color they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit on my hands,  but InnoGear is a great company
customer_reviews.text: On the tight side, and I have medium to large hands for a lady. I haven't tried them at the local pool yet for aerobics class but will update my review when I do. The company communication and policy is excellent, so I am updating this to five-star and would definitely order from InnoGear again.
customer_reviews.author: bkwrm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using them when I swim laps in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: KATHY A. DANIELS

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but they run small. Be careful when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: great for bad writs
customer_reviews.text: I am 63 years old and just started swimming at the gym i love these glives they help with swimming I have carpal tunnel in both hands and i have no pain while using these gloves
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to add some intensity to arm workout and baby let me tell you by the end of that second set my arms were on fire. I have kind of large wrist so the strap was a little tight on my arm but it wasn't to bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dorlee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great resistance gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for resistance training during water aerobics. They fit great and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Marge McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching is coming apart quickly. The chlorine has also changed the color. I've been using them for about a month (3 days a week) 6/22. Less than a month! Also, started tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time good fit. Very effective when used in any water exercise
customer_reviews.author: JRmiami

customer_reviews.title: Wrist quite small
customer_reviews.text: I bought size medium. At the point where the closure attaches (about 1.5 inches from my wrist bone), my wrist circumference is 6.75 inches. It barely closes (see attached photos). For other size reference, the circumference of the wides part of my palm (not including my thumb) is 7.75 inches, and my index finger is 3 inches long. That part fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: InnoGear Swim Gloves Aquatic Fitness Water Resistance Training Aqua Fit Webbed Gloves, Pack of 2
feature_bullets: Neoprene gloves for water resistance training
Get increased propulsion through the water
